name: LEFT prototype
description: Soo this is a game ive been workin on for a while now. Its just a 1st level and its veeeeeeery buggy  no no no listen VEEEEEEEEEEEEEERY FRICKIN BUGGY.  Most if not all of the bugs i already found and im currently working on fixing them. But feel free to report any bugs you encounter (which you definetly will) and also give some feedback. I would love to hear about your experience :))
